Articles.Content:
Build an aircraft capable of completing the course within a minimum time period (from take off until full-stop-landing). The aircraft is required to pass trough 10 checkpoint in sequence along the course. The direction of the next checkpoint is marked by the previous checkpoint with the help of a modified laser. Failing to meet these requirements will result in an invalid time.

Download the zip-file containing all required parts and save files from the link below:

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/35450765/KSP/Sky%20Race%20Challenge%20V1.1.zip

Screenshots of the Sky Race Challenge;

Some helpful tips:

- Stability is preferable above speed

- Playing the soundtrack from Top Gun has shown to be effective when aiming for fast flight

- Mind the low altitudes of the checkpoints

Good luck! And I am curious to see some fast times

Enzo

Edited October 16, 2012 by enzo_schmitz
